headline: Tim Ryan picks up big endorsement in bid for US Senator
author: Martin Oravec
sentences: Also picking up endorsements was Justice Jennifer Brunner for Chief Justice of the Ohio Supreme Court.
(WKBN) — The Ohio Democratic Executive Committee voted to endorse Tim Ryan’s U.S. Senate bid.
The committee will meet at a later date to consider endorsements for other statewide races.
Both Nan Whaley and John Cranley asked the committee to withhold an endorsement.
The committee did not issue an endorsement in the governor’s race.
